main event: A witness reported observing a round white object approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter, moving with a black band around it and emitting a whistling sound.
interesting points: The object was described as moving rapidly with a distinctive sound., The report mentions sketches and diagrams related to the object., The sighting occurred in Hillard, Ohio., There were credible witnesses associated with the report., The report spans various pages from Project Blue Book, with multiple forms and descriptions.
sighted object: round white object with a black band
witness description: A male observer who reported the sighting, age not specified but likely a teenager.
